description:
This durable, high-quality cobalt blue glass bottle is the perfect container for your all-natural products. Whether you use it to mist out your homemade floral waters, body spritzes, room sprays, or household cleaners, you’ll love this bottle’s sturdy feel and smooth spray. Because it is made of glass, this bottle is ideal for use with essential oils, and the cobalt blue color will protect your creations from harmful sunlight rays. Add this bottle to your collection now and spray away your problems.

Size: Bottle holds 8 ounces of liquid.

What’s Included: This item is sold individually. When you order, you get one cobalt blue glass bottles with trigger sprayer.

How to Use:

  1. Add desired liquid to the glass bottle.

  2. If necessary, trim the end of the tube on the sprayer to make it the ideal length (about ⅛” above the bottom of the bottle). Sprayer will work best if the tube is cut at a 45-degree angle.  

  3. When you’re ready to add the spray top on, wipe down the thread of both the bottle and the spray cap to get rid of any dust or buildup that might be there.

  4. Screw the spray cap on to the glass bottle.

  5. Spray your favorite homemade creations wherever you need them most.
name: 8 oz Cobalt Blue Glass Bottle With Trigger (Single)
short_description: Store all your homemade household cleaners, air fresheners, and more in this essential-oil-safe cobalt blue glass bottle. Its large size makes it perfect for large batches of homemade product, and its blue glass keeps UV rays from compromising the contents of the bottle.

description:
The 8th Edition of the Essential Oils Desk Reference is your comprehensive guide to the immense properties and capabilities of pure essential oils. This all-inclusive guide combines the factual findings of scientific research with tried-and-true methods for best use. Spiral binding allows pages to open completely and lie flat, enabling you to read and apply effortlessly. Coated pages help to keep your copy resilient from oily fingers, and the lighter paper makes it portable and less bulky.

Sidebar, full-bleed color-coding of the six main sections makes the Essential Oils Desk Reference easy to use.

 

DESCRIPTION

The “Essential Oils Desk Reference” is divided into six main sections for clarity and user-friendliness. Due to the immense amount of information contained within the book, each section is categorized by a corresponding color within the section guide. This color tabbing continues throughout the book allowing each section to be immediately identifiable and quickly located. Updated with the newest Young Living products, this new guide has everything you need to use ANY Young Living product.

 

A brief overview of each section is as follows:

Section 1: Introduction

  • A Brief History of Essential Oils and Their Place in Modern Medicine
  • A Breakdown of the Chemistry of Essential Oils and Effects
  • How to Safely Use Essential oils
  • Scientific Research and Documentation
  • Producing Therapeutic-Grade Essential Oils

Section 2: Products

  • Single Essential Oils and Their Application Codes
  • Essential Oil Blends and Their Application Codes
  • Nutritional References and Supplements
  • Ningxia Wolfberry
  • Hormones and Vibrant Health
  • Personal Care
  • Essential Oils and Nutrition for Children
  • Essential Oils Use in the Home
  • Animal Care with Essential Oils

Section 3: Application

  • Neuro Auricular Technique
  • Lymphatic Pump
  • Vita Flex Technique
  • Raindrop Technique

Section 4: Special Issues

  • Mental and Emotional Rejuvenation and Support
  • Aging, Antioxidants, Alkalinity, Cleansing and Diet
  • Enzymes, Minerals and Water

Section 5: Personal Usage

  • Getting Started with Essential Oils
  • Quick Usage Guide
  • Taking Charge of Your Health
  • A-Z Ailment Personal Usage Guide

Section 6: Appendix

  • Appendix, Bibliography and Index

Product Details:

Pages: 640

Chapters: 20

Published: March 2019

Binding: Spiral Bound

Size: 11” x 10” x 1.5” (with spiral binding)

description:
Kids love washing their hands with foam soap. (And adults do too!) With this foamer pump bottle in your cabinet, you can help your kids learn good hand-washing habits and enjoy it too. Just add your homemade soap, soap concentrate, or Thieves hand soap to the bottle, add water, and enjoy the benefits of washing your hands with extra-lathering soap.

What’s Included: This items is sold individually. When you order, you get one 8-ounce clear plastic bottle with white foamer pump top.

Size: Bottle holds 8 ounces of liquid.

How to Use:

  1. Fill the bottle about ⅛” to ¼” full of soap concentrate.

  2. Fill the rest of the bottle up with water.

  3. Screw the top of the bottle on and enjoy foam soap.

Helpful Hints: Did you know you can make your own foaming hand soap solution? All you need is pure castile soap, your favorite essential oils, and a little water. Add these to the foamer bottle, and you have an economical and healthy soap for your family.
name: 8 oz Clear Plastic Bottle With White Foamer Pump
short_description: Use this bottle for your homemade essential-oil-infused soap creations or to help extend the life of your liquid soaps. Just add soap to the bottle, and enjoy the silky-smooth foam soap that results.

description:
Just as essential oils can be powerful healing tools for humans, they can be beneficial for pets as well. However, because animals’ sense of smell is often much stronger than humans’, it’s important to introduce and use essential oils in the correct way when trying to treat pets. “Animals 101” teaches how to introduce essential oils to animals and how to use the proper dilution and oil amount depending on the animal in your care. It also teaches what individual essential oils can be used for on pets, and where to apply oils to get the best results with your pet. If you or someone in your client base has an animal they love, “Animals 101” is an essential oil guide that you won’t want to be without.

What’s Included: Mini Booklets sold individually

Pages: 15

Published: 2015
name: Animals 101 Mini Booklet
short_description: Share the “Animals 101” booklet with others interested in how essential oils can benefit their lives. If you have pet lovers in your client base, they will love this informative booklet that teaches how to properly use essential oils on pets to make pets’ lives healthier, happier, and more stress-free.

description:
Everybody loves foam soap. With its soft texture and bubbly coverage, it makes hand washing fun. With this pump foaming bottle, you can create foam soap wherever you are. Just add soap to the bottle, then stash it in your purse, backpack, or briefcase. Keep it in your car or take it camping with you. No matter where you go, you’ll have a fun and easy way to keep your hands clean. Your kids will love it too!

What’s Included: This item is sold individually. When you order, you get one clear bottle with foaming pump and cap.

Size: Bottle holds approximately 50 ml, or about 1 ⅔ fluid ounces.

How to Use:

  1. Fill the bottle about ⅛” to ¼” full of soap concentrate.

  2. Fill the rest of the bottle up with water.

  3. Screw the top of the bottle on and enjoy your foam soap wherever you go.

Helpful Hints: Did you know you can make your own foaming hand soap solution? All you need is pure castile soap, your favorite essential oils, and a little water. Add these to the foamer bottle, and you have an economical and healthy soap for your family.
name: 50 ml Clear Foamer Bottle
short_description: Use this small foaming pump to create silky smooth, ultra-lathering soap. Small enough to fit in your purse, this bottle is the perfect size for taking soap with you wherever you go.

description:
You’ve created your own all natural air freshener/household cleaner/perfume. Now you need the perfect container to hold your precious creation. These durable spray bottles are made of thick glass that won’t react with essential oils, and their dark blue color keeps the sunlight from shortening the life of homemade products. Add a set of four glass spray bottles to your collection and enjoy the convenience of misting your favorite products with a smooth spray.

Size: Bottles hold 4 ounces of liquid.

What’s Included: This item is sold in a pack of four. When you order, you get four cobalt blue glass bottles with trigger sprayers.

How to Use:

  1. Add desired liquid to the glass bottle.

  2. If necessary, trim the end of the tube on the sprayer to make it the ideal length (about ⅛” above the bottom of the bottle). Sprayer will work best if the tube is cut at a 45-degree angle.  

  3. When you’re ready to add the spray top on, wipe down the thread of both the bottle and the spray cap to get rid of any dust or buildup that might be there.

  4. Screw the spray cap on to the glass bottle.

  5. Spray your favorite homemade creations wherever you need them most.

description:
This stunning amber glass roll-on bottle is the perfect size to hold your favorite essential oil blends and carry them with you wherever you go. When you are out and about and need your oils, you can get out your bottle, roll oil where you need it, and be at the top of your game.

What’s Included: This item is sold in a 6-pack. When you order, you get six 10-ml amber glass with steel ball roll-on and included cap.

Size: Bottle holds approximately 10 ml of liquid, or about ⅓ ounce.

How to Use:

  1. For the best results when using essential oils in roll-on bottles, you may want to use a carrier oil like our Coconut Oil or V6 Vegetable Oil.

  2. To add liquid to this roll-on glass bottle, it is easiest to use a glass dropper or pipette for the most efficient transfer of oils. Just suck the liquid up from the container you have mixed it in (or directly from the essential oil bottle) and squeeze it into the amber glass bottle.

  3. While holding the bottle upright, push the roller top firmly onto the top of the bottle until it clicks into place.

  4. Screw the cap on over the roll-on ball.

  5. Store bottles upright to prevent spills.

Helpful Hints:

Don’t forget to label your bottles! Whether you are keeping them for yourself or giving them away, labels will help you remember what’s inside and avoid misuse.
name: 10 ml Amber Glass Bottle with Steel Ball Roll-on (6-pack)
short_description: Whether you use this amber glass bottle with steel ball roll-on to hold your favorite massage oil or an essential oil blend, its roll-on top will allow you to apply your product directly where you need it and do so smoothly and evenly.

description:
Spread the word about Young Living essential oils by allowing others the chance to sample essential oils for themselves with these beautiful, high-quality glass containers. Simply add your favorite blends to the bottle using a pipette or glass dropper, label the bottle, and share the benefits of essential oils with your loved ones, co-workers, and potential clients. All 1 ml bottles come with steel ball roll-ons and a cap to make essential oil use as simple and clean as possible.  

What’s Included: When you order this product, you get a pack of 12 amber 1 ml glass bottles, complete with steel ball roll-ons and black caps.

Size:  Bottles are ½" in width by 1 ½" in height and hold 1 ml of oil (between 25 and 40 drops).

How to Use:

  1. Use a pipette or glass dropper to transfer desired liquid into the 1 ml glass bottle.
  2. Once desired liquid is in the bottle, snap the stell ball roll-on onto the top of the bottle. The steel ball roll-on allows for smooth application of essential oils.

description:
<p dir="ltr"><span>It’s becoming more and more popular to use essential oils to make essential oil blends and homemade cosmetics, creams, and sprays. When you do this kind of custom creating, it’s important to use glass bottles, not plastic, so that the chemicals in plastic don’t get into the oil mixture. These amber glass bottles are ideal for all of your oil-mixing and cosmetic-creating needs. Made of amber-colored glass, they allow less light in than clear glass, allowing the contents of the bottles to stay pure for a longer period of time. </span></p>
<p>The 1 oz. size is the perfect size to fit in your purse, backpack, or briefcase for more convenient travel. At less than a dollar apiece, these amber glass bottles are a must-have for your essential oil toolset.  </p>
<p><span style="color: #3366ff;"><strong><em>What’s Included:</em> </strong></span>Six 1 oz. amber glass bottles with pump sprayers and plastic caps.</p>
<p><span style="color: #3366ff;"><strong><em>Size:</em></strong> </span>Bottles hold 1 oz. of liquid.</p>
<p><span style="color: #3366ff;"><strong><em>How to Use:</em></strong></span></p>
<ol>
<li dir="ltr">
<p dir="ltr"><span>Transfer essential oils or other materials into the amber glass bottles using a glass dropper or pipette. </span></p>
</li>
<li dir="ltr">
<p dir="ltr"><span>Cut the sprayer top’s tube to the appropriate length if necessary. For best results, cut it at a 45-degree angle. </span></p>
</li>
<li dir="ltr">
<p dir="ltr"><span>Screw the pump sprayer lid on tightly. </span></p>
</li>
<li dir="ltr">
<p dir="ltr"><span>Replace the plastic cap. </span></p>
</li>
<li dir="ltr">
<p dir="ltr"><span>Carry your favorite creations with you wherever you go and easily share them with family and friends. </span></p>
</li>
</ol>
<p><span style="color: #3366ff;"><em><strong>Helpful Hints:</strong></em></span></p>
<ol>
<li dir="ltr">
<p dir="ltr"><span>Check out our selection of glass droppers to make your essential oil mixing much easier and mess-free!</span></p>
</li>
<li dir="ltr">
<p dir="ltr"><span>If you are using the glass bottles to make a liquid spray with your favorite essential oils, try using epsom salts to keep the oil and water from separating. Just sprinkle epsom salts on the bottom of the bottle, add your essential oils, then fill the remainder of the bottle with water. </span></p>
</li>
</ol>
<p dir="ltr"> </p>
<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-c2fa07e3-0013-9a50-f01f-9f1679a1834d"><br /><br /><br /><br /></span></p>

description:
Use this set of colorful 1/2 oz amber glass bottles to store your favorite homemade beauty and health products. With six bottles in a pack, these bottles are the perfect size to share your homemade creations with family, friends, and clients. The amber glass keeps out harmful UV rays, keeping your creations fresh longer.

What’s Included: When you order this product, you get 6 amber 1/2 oz glass bottles. You also get pump sprayers and caps to fit the bottles.

Size: Bottles hold approximately ½ ounce of liquid.  

How to Use:

  1. To fill amber pump bottles with your desired liquid, first remove the cap by unscrewing it.  

  2. Add oils, water, perfumes, hand sanitizing sprays, or floral spritzes to the bottle. If you are using essential oils in your concoction, check out our selection of droppers and pipettes to make transfer easier.

  3. Screw the pump spray cap onto the bottle and enjoy the ease and convenience of being able to spray your favorite creations whenever you need them.

Helpful Hints: If you are using these bottles to share your homemade natural products with others, be sure to include a label so that others know what they are getting. Even if you are using them to store your own products, labeling them will ensure you don’t forget the contents of your bottles.

description:
It’s becoming more and more popular to use essential oils to make essential oil blends and homemade cosmetics, creams, and sprays. When you do this kind of custom creating, it’s important to use glass bottles, not plastic, so that the chemicals in plastic don’t get into the oil mixture. These cobalt blue glass bottles are ideal for all of your oil-mixing and cosmetic-creating needs. Made of cobalt blue colored glass, they allow less light in than clear glass, allowing the contents of the bottles to stay pure for a longer period of time.

The 1 oz. size is the perfect size to fit in your purse, backpack, or briefcase for more convenient travel. At less than a dollar apiece, these cobalt blue glass bottles are a must-have for your essential oil toolset.  

What’s Included: Six 1 oz. cobalt blue glass bottles with pump sprayers and plastic caps.

Size: Bottles hold 1 oz. of liquid.

How to Use:

  1. Transfer essential oils or other materials into the amber glass bottles using a glass dropper or pipette.

  2. Cut the sprayer top’s tube to the appropriate length if necessary. For best results, cut it at a 45-degree angle.

  3. Screw the pump sprayer lid on tightly.

  4. Replace the plastic cap.

  5. Carry your favorite creations with you wherever you go and easily share them with family and friends.

Helpful Hints:

  1. Check out our selection of glass droppers to make your essential oil mixing much easier and mess-free!

  2. If you are using the glass bottles to make a liquid spray with your favorite essential oils, try using epsom salts to keep the oil and water from separating. Just sprinkle epsom salts on the bottom of the bottle, add your essential oils, then fill the remainder of the bottle with water.

description:
The all-in-one resource for using essential oils. With its smart design and unique format, using essential oils has never been easier! OIL + GLASS is a beautiful and modern hard-cover recipe book, made with premium materials. It contains 164 pages filled with tried-and-tested essential oil DIY recipes, oil education and safety tips, dilution ratios, step-by-step directions, suggested supplies, and stunning photography. This one-of-a-kind recipe book is intended to shorten the learning curve for people just starting out with essential oils, as well as experienced users. OIL + GLASS covers everything from supporting your immune system, body woes, skincare, household, children, garden, and pregnancy, to emotional uses, and more. OIL + GLASS demystifies using essential oils and makes them accessible to everyone. Learn how to make whipped body butters, sprays, roller bottle blends, as well as tonifying drinks. Keep this book in your kitchen, like a well-loved cookbook, or leave it out on your coffee table...it’s that beautiful!

description:
Nothing says hello like a drop of Young Living 100% pure therapeutic-grade essential oil. Giving someone a bottle is too expensive. Letting them inhale from your bottle? Well, it's too fleeting. Giving them a pamphlet or tear sheet on its own? Too stale. That's why Life Science Publishing & Products created the Say Hello Experience Kit. It only takes a few, well-selected, and perfectly-timed drops to change someone's life—to fill their senses with the world's best oils and speak to their personal needs.

Each Say Hello Experience Kit comes in a beautiful, custom-made, Young Living- branded boxed set. Included in each box are three 1 milliliter (ML) amber roller-top sample bottles (essential oil not included).  Put your favorite, specially selected samples of essential oils or blends that you want someone to experience in each bottle.

Also included in the box set is our beautiful, full color, Say Hello booklet, packed with information and usage tips on 55 of the most popular Young Living essential oils. Now you can take a 15-ml bottle of your favorite Young Living oil and share it with up to 15 people! Each of your recipients gets to enjoy 20 drops. Not only will they experience the oils, but they’ll also have the helpful information that makes them infinitely valuable. This one-two punch boxed set makes sharing and educating a breeze. You literally just add oil! 

Invest in the shared experience today! Change someone’s life with a Say Hello Experience Kit, only from Life Science.

description:
The cobalt blue glass of these bottles makes them not only ideal for use with essential oils, but also a powerful protection against damaging UV rays. Use them to hold any all-natural sprays, mists, or spritzes, and enjoy the convenience of being able to spray your favorite products wherever you go, whenever you need them.

What’s Included: This item is sold in a pack of six. When you order, you get six cobalt blue 2-ounce bottles with included pump sprayers and caps.

Size: Bottles are 4 inches tall and 1 ½ inches in diameter and hold 2 ounces of liquid.

How to Use:

  1. For best results, wipe down the threads of the sprayer and the bottle first to remove any dust or buildup.

  2. If necessary, cut the tube on the sprayer to approximately ⅛” above the bottom of the bottle.

  3. Fill the bottle with your preferred liquid.

  4. Screw the spray top on and spritz away!

Helpful Hints: If you are using the cobalt blue glass bottles to create an essential oil spray, you will have best results if you use a carrier oil (like our Coconut Oil or V-6 Vegetable Oil) or water along with some Epsom salts. Just sprinkle the Epsom salts on the bottom of the bottle, add several drops of essential oil, and allow the salts to soak up the essential oils for a few moments. Then fill the rest of the bottle with carrier oil or water, and enjoy an easy-to-apply essential oil creation.

It makes the perfect share tool for other horse lovers, and comes in a great price point.

Page Count: 32

Year Published: 2018

description:
The possibilities are endless when you have a six-pack of nasal inhalers in your medicine cabinet. Use them as a portable diffuser, a tool for relief of nasal congestion, or a container to pass out samples to potential clients. Because of their small size, it’s easy to slip one into your purse, pocket, briefcase, or backpack, then take it out and breathe deeply whenever you need a boost.

What’s Included: This item is sold in a package of six. When you order, you get six white nasal inhalers with included caps and essential oil wicks.

How to Use:

  1. Remove the cap and unscrew the base of the inhaler to locate the wick.

  2. Add several drops of your preferred essential oil to the wick, then re-insert it into the inhaler.  

  3. Replace the base by screwing it back on. Replace the cap of the inhaler if you are saving it for later use.

  4. Whenever you need a breath of purifying, healing oils, remove the cap of the inhaler and breathe deeply.


Helpful Hints: If you have a cold, inhalers can be an invaluable tool to relieve nasal congestion. Add peppermint oil or any other essential oil that enhances breathing to the inhaler, and get instant relief.

short_description: Relieve nasal congestion with your favorite essential oils added to these conveniently portable nasal inhalers. They also make an ideal vehicle for taking your favorite essential oil aromas with you wherever you go.

description:
You’ve created your own all natural air freshener/household cleaner/perfume. Now you need the perfect container to hold your precious creation. These durable spray bottles are made of thick glass that won’t react with essential oils, and their amber color keeps the sunlight from shortening the life of homemade products. Add a set of four glass spray bottles to your collection and enjoy the convenience of misting your favorite products with a smooth spray.

Size: Bottles hold 4 ounces of liquid.

What’s Included: This item is sold in a pack of four. When you order, you get four amber glass bottles with trigger sprayers.

How to Use:

  1. Add desired liquid to the glass bottle.

  2. If necessary, trim the end of the tube on the sprayer to make it the ideal length (about ⅛” above the bottom of the bottle). Sprayer will work best if the tube is cut at a 45-degree angle.  

  3. When you’re ready to add the spray top on, wipe down the thread of both the bottle and the spray cap to get rid of any dust or buildup that might be there.

  4. Screw the spray cap on to the glass bottle.

  5. Spray your favorite homemade creations wherever you need them most.

description:
Aroma Breathe is about all things diffusing. With 48 pages and 34 recipes, this gets you well on your way, and co-author Katie Ganger has plenty more for future volumes. Diffusing is one of the easiest ways to incorporate essential oils into your lives, and one of the most natural ways to share. When people come into your home and enjoy the wonderful sensation that comes from diffusion, it intrigues them into wanting to know more. It’s a natural conversation starter.

 Says co-author Katie Ganger: “I’m proud of what we created in Aroma Breathe. I truly believe that diffusion provides limitless possibilities. This is a perfect book for anyone starting out with Young Living or for veterans who are stuck in a rut and would like some fresh ideas. It’s an even better way to get members of your team re-enthused, re-energized, and re-engaged!”

description: Lucy Libido has done it again, and this time with extra help from her good friend, Betsy Bosom! Lucy and Betsy have gone above and beyond to research many of our favorite oils and how they impact both mom and baby. They cover every topic that a mom could think to need while pregnant and after bringing baby home. They provide fun blends and fantastic recipes for the many seasons of change that mommies are bound to go through. All the while, they’re giving the inside scoop on why we choose to focus on certain oils and avoid others! This dynamic duo really pulls together the greatest use of essential oils from the beginnings of trying to conceive all the way to holding baby in your loving arms.

description:
This set of fading purple to yellow glass 5 ml roll-on bottles have a sleek slim shape that helps them fit more compactly and evenly in a small space. Use them to share your favorite oils, mixes, or carry smaller versions of your favorite oils.

What’s Included: Six 5 ML glass roll-on bottles with steel balls. Gold lid caps are included.

Size: Bottles are 2 ¼” high and ¾” in diameter. Bottles hold 5 ML, or about 1/4 ounce, of liquid.  

How to Use:

  1. Add desired liquid to the roll-on glass bottles. If you are using essential oils, you will likely have best results if you also use a carrier oil to make the roll-on bottle roll more evenly. (Try using our glass droppers or pipettes for the easiest transfer of oils.)
  2. While holding the bottle upright, carefully and firmly push the roller top onto the mouth of the bottle until it clicks into place.
  3. Label your bottle so you don’t forget what’s inside.
  4. Store bottles upright to prevent spills.

Helpful Hints: If you misplace or wear out any of the steel balls in these roll-on bottles, it’s easy to replace them. Just order a six-pack of our Steel Roll-on Ball Replacements and pop a new steel ball into your glass bottle top

description:
Whether you like to create your own perfumes, air fresheners, or breath sprays, this purple glass with spray top atomizer is the ideal container for on-the-go use. Inside the purple casing, a thin glass vial holds whatever liquid you add to the atomizer, meaning it’s safe for use with essential oils and can hold any of your favorite essential oil mixtures. Add your favorite blend to the atomizer and keep it with you wherever you go for easy spray-on application.

What’s Included: One purple glass atomizer with silver cap.

Size: Atomizer is approximately 3” tall and ½” in diameter. Glass vial inside holds approximately 10 ml of liquid.

How to Use:

  1. To add your own mixtures to the atomizer, first remove the cap and pull the silver casing off the inner glass vial.

  2. Unscrew the spray cap from the glass vial.

  3. Pour desired liquid into the glass vial, then replace the spray cap and the silver casing.

  4. Spritz breath fresheners, body sprays, and more.

description:
This six-pack of 5 ml glass bottles comes in deep cobalt blue not just because it is a stunning color, but also because the deep cobalt blue glass lets in less light. This means that when you store your essential oil creations in these bottles, the oil quality is not compromised. Mix your favorite oils together, transfer them to these blue glass bottles, and rest assured your oil creation will maintain its potency much longer than it otherwise would.

What’s Included: When you order this product, you get a pack of 6 cobalt blue 5 ml glass bottles, complete with droppers.

Size: Bottles hold 5 ml of oil, or approximately 1 teaspoon.

How to Use:

  1. Use a pipette or glass dropper (order one here) to transfer desired liquid into the 5 ml glass bottle.
  2. Once desired liquid is in the bottle, screw on dropper to the top of the bottle. The dropper allows for drop-by-drop use of essential oils, making application much smoother.
  3. Share your essential oil magic with the world.

Helpful Hints: When using glass bottles for long-term storage of essential oil creations, look for colored glass like amber or cobalt to ensure that too much light won’t get into your bottles and damage the oils. Check out our other sizes of cobalt blue bottles to fit all your bottling needs.

description:
<p>These specially designed cards were written to compliment the essential oils found within Young Living's Feelings Kit and other emotion related oils. Each card has the name of an oil and is paired with an intentionally written corresponding affirmation to make the most out of each application. At the bottom of each card (18 cards total) there is an oil alternative in case someone doesn't own that specific emotional oil, that way people can participate no matter which oils they currently have. </p>
<p></p>
<p>Story from the author, Maura McDanel: "I realized it can be easy for people to overlook the emotional oils because not everyone knows what to do with them. The cards are meant to be a tool to help people integrate these oils into their everyday lives with ease. I put a lot of intentional energy into writing these cards. I spent time smelling each oil, did research on the meaning of each blend, and listened to what come into my mind naturally. It was a fun process and now it fees so good to add a sacred element to my day by applying an emotional oil and saying these affirming words. It's typically before meditating or when I just have 2 minutes of quiet time. Overall this practice has helped me become better at staying connected to myself." </p>

description:
If you are ready to reset your body for increased energy and vibrant health, Inner Transformations Using Essential Oils is an invaluable tool that will show you how. In this book, husband and wife team Doctors LeAnne and David Deardeuff lead you on a path to cleansing your body of toxins through carefully-constructed cleanses that purify one organ at a time. Learn how to clear toxins out of your colon, eliminate yeast, create a healthy gut, maintain your liver, and support your lungs, glands, and other major body systems. Using powerful essential oils, Dr. Deardeuff will show you how to give your body a complete reset and enjoy the resulting health and vitality.     

Overview of Topics:

  • Is your body toxic?

  • To everything there is a time and a season

  • Essential oils: Gold of the gods

  • The colon: Don’t block the exit

  • The critical role of gut bacteria

  • The kidney: Murky mere or crystal clear

  • Yeast infections: Surprisingly deadly

  • The master cleanse and more

  • The liver: Your body’s chemical plant

  • Metals and more: Modern hazards

  • Other important organs

  • Colon and Lungs

  • Other body systems that may need attention

  • Sick and tired of being sick and tired

  • Pituitary, thyroid, adrenals: Glands that make you go

  • Infertility and sex hormones

  • Cleansing and nutrition for prospective mothers

  • Children and essential oils

  • Perils of modern times: Diabetes, obesity, allergies

  • Building blocks of better health

  • A few words about detoxification reactions

  • Stress: Don’t let it wear on you

Pages: 268

Chapters: 22

Published: 2014

Size: 6” x 9” x .75”

*Be sure to check out LeAnne and David Deardeuff's other inspirational book – “Taming the Dragon Within” and LeAnne’s book “Ultimate Balance”. Both of these books are available through Life Science Publishing.

description:

He presents the scientific basis for anointing with oil as a healing method taught and practiced by Jesus to his disciples. Due to its comprehensive and historical research, “Healing Oils of the Bible” combines clear Biblical answers for practical applications.

description:
Have you ever wondered why the wise men brought frankincense and myrrh for the baby Jesus? As a curious and highly enthusiastic child, health and wellness coach Teri Secrest asked everyone she knew and met, but no one could tell her. She grew up thinking it was just a nice little story…but never stopped wondering.

This thirst for knowledge sparked Teri’s twenty-three-year quest to learn about essential oils. It has taken her to the far corners of the world—from Croatia and France to Oman, Israel, and beyond.

Teri has written this book to share the mystery, the romance, and the ageless intrigue of essential oils. She hopes you experience the Father’s love as He continually lavishes His children with these exquisite oils and you feel this rich, biblical history come alive in your spirit. Teri wants you to see how miraculous your body is and how it’s designed to heal itself when given proper nourishment and support.
name: Essential Oils: God's Extravagant Provision for Your Health - Teri Secrest
short_description: Essential Oils: God’s Extravagant Provision for Your Health offers practical how-to’s that you can use immediately, including the use of oils for romance, balancing hormones, cooking, cleaning, pets, children, and fragrance, as well as health concerns such as stress, negative emotions, trouble sleeping, weight gain, and anxiety. You will find practical guidance to regain and maintain health naturally.

description:
Boss Up! will help you put your business on the map and the ideas you’ve previously only dreamed about into the marketplace. It will help you overcome your fears and guilt to find a fulfillment that changes you and your families for the better. And it will help you break free of the hard and boring and allow you to have fun along the way.

In Boss Up! Lindsay helps you gain the confidence to know that having ambition doesn’t make you a bad mother or wife. That it’s okay to have a desire for something more than endless sippy cups, clean-ups, Band-Aids, and groundings. That no matter your education or experience, you can tap into your passions and create businesses that give you increased flexibility, fulfillment, and financial security. 

And Lindsay doesn’t just do this through commiserating but, instead, through giving you the tools for change. Using the lessons she learned on her own path to success, Lindsay shares real, solid business principles with ten distinct success philosophies that you will encounter on the journey to entrepreneurship, such as:

  • Think Long Term
  • Be Unapologetically Yourself
  • Use the Unsales Tactic
  • Understand Your Why
  • and many more

Stay-at-home mom turned multimillion-dollar-producing business owner Lindsay Teague Moreno doesn’t just have a passion for entrepreneurship. She has a deep passion for helping women of all walks of life gain the confidence and skills to tap into their ambition and achieve success in their own business endeavors.

description:
Get instant moisture and essential-oil-infused air no matter where you are with this handheld diffuser. Gone is the poor design and functionality with the AAA batteries and replaced by this USB port, simple to charge and easy to use diffuser that will last up to 12 hours on a single charge. It is also lightweight and slim so it’s easy to fit it in a pocket of your purse or briefcase and carry it with you wherever you go. Using ultrasonic and atomization technology, the handheld diffuser vibrates an amazing 300 million times per second, sending out an ultrafine, super-soft mist that moisturizes the air you breathe and can be used with essential oils for instant healing throughout the day.  

What’s Included: When you order this item, you get one handheld diffuser with included carrying case.

Size: Diffuser is approximately 1 ¼ inches wide, 4 ½ inches tall, and 1 inch thick.  

How to Use:

  1. Fill the water tank inside the diffuser with water. (Water tank holds approximately 7 ml.)
  2. Add a few drops of your favorite essential oils into the water.
  3. Anytime you need moisture or fresh, healing air throughout the day, slide the diffuser cover down and breathe in deeply.
  4. Hold diffuser in an upright position. (note, diffuser will diffuse for approximately 30 seconds and then shut off. Simply slide the cover down and back up for another 30 second mist.)

Specifications:

Power Supply: 1.8W • Battery: 550mAH rechargable lithiumion battery •

Charge Voltage: DC5V/500mA

Mist Output: 1 ml/sec.

Total output: 5 min on/off

Covergage: 150 square feet

 

Disclaimer: NEVER PUT ESSENTIAL OILS DIRECTLY INTO THE PERSONAL MISTER RESERVOIR. Pure essential oils will dissolve plastic unless properly diluted. Always use the provided applicator bottle: add distilled water first, then add desired drops of essential oil. Close and shake well. Then use the applicator bottle to fill the reservoir.
name: Handy Mister Personal Diffuser 2.0 Purple
short_description: Take your diffuser with you wherever you go in the form of a sleek handheld mister. Not much bigger than most cell phones, this handheld diffuser is convenient for your on-the-go diffusing needs.

This means that when you store your essential oil creations in these bottles, the oil quality is not compromised. Mix your favorite oils together, transfer them to these amber glass bottles, and rest assured your oil creation will maintain its potency much longer than it otherwise would.

What’s Included: When you order this product, you get a pack of 6 amber 4 ml glass bottles, complete with droppers.

Size: Bottles hold 4 ml of oil, or approximately 1 teaspoon.

How to Use:

  1. Use a pipette or glass dropper (order one here) to transfer desired liquid into the 4 ml glass bottle.
  2. Once desired liquid is in the bottle, screw on dropper to the top of the bottle. The dropper allows for drop-by-drop use of essential oils, making application much smoother.
  3. Share your essential oil magic with the world.

Helpful Hints: When using glass bottles for long-term storage of essential oil creations, look for colored glass like amber or cobalt to ensure that too much light won’t get into your bottles and damage the oils. Check out our other sizes of cobalt blue bottles to fit all your bottling needs.

Mein’s “Releasing Emotional Patterns with Essential Oils.”  Specific organs within the body house emotions at the cellular level. Thus, in order for cleansing and clarity to be reached, emotions must be released at the cellular level.  These techniques center on the limbic portion of the brain which serves as a center point for our emotions.  The natural remedies outlined for releasing these deep emotions were first employed by the ancient Egyptians. “Releasing Emotional Patterns with Essential Oils” provides a step-by-step guide to cleanse our bodies of unwanted, imbedded emotions using Essential Oils.  Filled with over 130 pages of diagrams, charts and information, this book provides an easy to understand map for emotional well-being.  Follow the instructions outlined in “Releasing Emotional Patterns with Essential Oils” to remove your emotional roadblocks and lead a happier more fulfilling life!

description:
When you need to transfer essential oils, mix oils together, or fill empty pill capsules, disposable pipettes are the perfect tool. Inexpensive and easy-to-use, these 5.0-ml-size plastic pipettes are a must-have for your medicine cabinet.  

What’s Included: This item is sold in a package of six. When you order, you get six disposable pipettes, each 5.0 ml in size.

Size: Pipettes hold 5.0 ml of liquid.

How to Use: Disposable pipettes are handy and easy to use. Just follow these steps:

  1. Squeeze the bulb of the pipette.

  2. Place the tip of the pipette into desired liquid and release the bulb while tip is still submersed in liquid. This will fill the pipette up with liquid.

  3. Squeeze the bulb to release liquid from the pipette.   

Helpful Hints: If you need different size pipettes for different jobs, check out our larger pipette size, which holds 3 ml of liquid.

description:
The 5ml Purple & Gold Heart-Shaped Atomizer is the perfect addition to any handbag or cosmetic case. Its convenient size and shape allow you to take your favorite essential oil mist wherever you go. Filling it is easy, and the elegant gold detailing elevates this functional accessory’s charming shape & style.

 What’s Included: 1 5ml Purple & Gold Heart-Shaped Atomizer

 Size: 7/8” Diameter x 3.25” Length

 How to Use:

 1. Gently remove the lid.

2. Carefully lift the gold-detailed top from the casing.

3. Twist the top off of the glass reservoir.

4. Add distilled water to within ¼ inch of the top.

5. Add your favorite essential oils.

6. Replace the top.

7. Tuck the glass reservoir back into the casing.

8. Shake well.

9. Spray at your leisure.

 Helpful Hints: Clean the reservoir after using up each batch. Do not use pure oil in this atomizer, cut with distilled water.
name: 5 ml Heart Shaped Purple Atomizer
short_description: Show your love of essential oils with this 5ml Purple & Gold Heart-Shaped Atomizer. The clever styling brings sophistication and charm to any accessory collection.   1. Transfer oil from another bottle to the 1/6 glass vials using a plastic pipette, syringe or glass dropper.  Check out our plastic pipettes (1.5 and 3 mL) to simplify the transfer process!

  • Use a drop plastic pipette to make refilling sample bottles a breeze!  Our plastic pipette can fit through the neck of the 1/6 glass vials which reduces the chance of spillage.

description:
Lucy Libido decided to teach women how to use essential oils between the sheets. She got a group of women together, and they all agreed to use oils in the bedroom for several weeks and months, and then share their results. The juicy results were divulged in a Valentine’s Day Class “There’s an Oil for THAT”.

The news of the online class spread like wildfire. Women from around the globe came together to learn how to rekindle their relationships. The results that were experienced were heartwarming and tear-jerking. Lucy received message after message about how the class had finally helped women get over their emotional and physical blocks. For some, it was a defining point or saving grace in their marriages. Developed by a woman for a woman, "There's an Oil for THAT" gives you all the tips and fun in one easy to read book that you'll want to store at your bedside.

Size: 6.2 x 9.2

Page Count: 114

description:
“Have you ever felt as if there was a time bomb inside you ready to explode at any second, yet you are unable to identify the source of this feeling?”  Unresolved and repressed negative feelings remain alive in one’s physical energy field and affect day-to-day life.  Learn how to address and resolve this negativity with the revised and updated edition of “Feelings Buried Alive Never Die”.  Buried feelings are very real.  They are energies in and of themselves and will manifest sooner or later.  Learn how to understand, cope and manage these energies in a therapeutic and healthy fashion with author Karol Truman’s guidance.  Tune into your feelings and learn how to use the tool dialogue of “scripting” to transform your emotions.  Free yourself of negative emotional energy with “Feelings Buried Alive Never Die”.

 Overview of Topic:

  • Chapter 1: The Language of Feelings
  • Chapter 2: Energy Vibrations
  • Chapter 3: Where Feelings Begin
  • Chapter 4: How Feelings Impact Our Lives
  • Chapter 5: The Importance of Becoming Single Minded
  • Chapter 6: Erasing Illusions
  • Chapter 7: Let's Get Started

  • Chapter 9: It Just "Is"
  • Chapter 10: Early Up-Bringing
  • Chapter 11: Becoming Accountable
  • Chapter 12: Getting Along With Others
  • Chapter 13: When Feelings Remain Unresolved
  • Chapter 14: Discharge Your Stress
  • Chapter 15: Eliminating Stressors
  • Chapter 16: Enjoy the "Now"
  • Chapter 17: List of Feelings
  • Chapter 18: A Personal Experience and Probable Feelings Causing Illness
  • Chapter 19: Self-Fulfilling Prophecies
  • Chapter 20: A More Harmonious Being
  • Chapter 21: Freeing The Soul

 Be sure to check out Karol Truman’s other inspirational book – “Healing Feelings From Your Heart”. This book is available through Life Science Publishing.

Pages: 307

Chapters: 21

Published: 2013

Size: 6” x 9” x .75”

description:
“Chemistry of Essential Oils Made Even Simpler” by Michelle M Truman, Ed.D., is a distillation of the seminal book “Chemistry of Essential Oils Made Simple” by David Stewart, Ph.D.  It provides a fundamental look at the why and how Essential Oils work in the body.  It also delves into the different perspectives on aromatherapy and the different grades of Essential Oils.  The graphics and illustrations aid in understanding basic chemistry formulations through the beginning stages of quantum physics.   Molecules of Essential Oils are packed with power and action and do wonderful things in the body.  If we have a basic understanding of how they work we can use them more effectively. 

Overview of Topics:

  • Why Do I Need to Know Chemistry?
  • Left and Right Brain Work Together
  • Use Oils to Assist in Comprehension
  • Four Ways Essential Oils Get into the Body
  • How are Essential Oils Used?
  • Essential Oils in the United States
  • Growing a Therapeutic Grade Essential Oil
  • Are all Oils Created Equally?
  • Example of a Food Grade Oil
  • Synthetic vs Therapeutic Grade Essential Oils
  • Synthetics Do Not Heal
  • What Exactly is an Essential Oil?
  • Essential Oils and Fatty Oils
  • What is Homeostasis?
  • Essential Oils Bring the Body Back into Balance or Homeostasis
  • What is Chemistry?
  • Is Electricity in Every Chemical Process?
  • God's Plan for Creation in a Table (periodic table)
  • The Periodic Table of Elements
  • Who Discovered the Periodic Table?
  • How do the Elements Interact in the Body?
  • Plus 73 more help;.

Product Details:

Pages: 99

Chapters: 98

Published: 1st Printing 2012, 2nd Printing 2013

Size: 8.25 x 11 x .25;

description:
When Jodie had her first child, she was like any other mother.  She struggled to figure out how to cope with a fussy baby and tried  to make the best choices for her son’s health and well-being.  So she trusted the approach of traditional medicine.

Despite the nagging feeling that those midnight cries meant something wasn’t quite right with her son, she tried to convince herself that because he was a boy, he was just developing slower. 
Until one day her instincts were confirmed.  
She was told not only had she lost the son she once knew, but there was nothing she could do about it.  
Jodie embarked on a mission to recover the son she knew she had lost.  Armed with research, the experience of trusted therapists, the power of alternative medicine, and physicians, Jodie discovered a path to bringing her son back; but, most of all, she uncovered her voice. 
She would never again let someone else call the shots when it came to her son’s health, especially when her gut was telling her something wasn’t right. 
Jodie’s inspiring story is a journey of a mother, learning to listen closely to her intuition.  Through grit, anger, a “watch me do it” attitude, and pure determination, she reversed her son’s Autism diagnosis. 
In the pages of this book , Jodie will reveal the smoking bullet that links the diagnosis of  Autism, to most other health challenges children face today.  Blowing up the myth that there is nothing can can be done.
The message of this book will inspire and empower families to speak up for the children they love even when it seems no one is listening.
name: Speak Up Buttercup - Jodie Meschuk
short_description: Jodie’s inspiring story is a journey of a mother, learning to listen closely to her intuition.  Through grit, anger, a “watch me do it” attitude, and pure determination, she reversed her son’s Autism diagnosis. The message of this book will inspire and empower families to speak up for the children they love even when it seems no one is listening.

description:
Momtrepreneurs, listen up!

You don’t have time for another “change everything you’re doing on social media and be just like me” book. You need information and you need it fast. Do you want to grow your following, sell more product, and experience the freedom that comes with being a lady boss?

Getting Noticed isn’t the “secret to social media” – it’s a no fluff, take charge guide to the way we present ourselves, our business, and connect with customers online.

Lindsey Teague Moreno knows the hardcore mom life. In between wash cycles, packing lunches, and balancing a to-do list that would make Santa jealous, she grew a business from nothing into a team of 300,000 people producing over $15,000,000 each month in just three years. Lindsay knows you don’t have time for another book that leaves you with temporary warm fuzzies but no real content to actually building your business. Getting noticed is the first step to entrepreneurial success in our fast-paced, online world.

Step up your game.

description:
"The Animals Never Lie" is a collection of intriguing case reports from Dr. Fox’s holistic veterinary practice that will inspire and amaze you. Many times, alternative medical therapies are sought after an animal hasn’t responded to conventional medicine or when it has been given a poor prognosis from a chronic disease. Animals cannot fake or pretend a response to treatment, whatever method of therapy is chosen. Oftentimes, when a product from nature is offered, the animal instinctively “knows” what it needs and readily accepts it. There is no prejudice or bias where animals are concerned: the animals never lie. You’ll be astonished at the animals’ resiliency and strong will to persevere as you read through these stories of spinal injury, severe allergies, chronic illness, cancer, etc. All of the case reports have been “translated” into easy-to-understand language so non-practitioners can easily read them.

Page Count: 103

description:
Creating beautiful colored roll-on vials has never been more easy. These colored glass roll-ons help protect your essential oils from damaging UV light. Metal rollers make application easy and smooth.

Size: Bottles are 1/2" in width and 1 1/2" in height and hold 1 ml of oil (between 40 and 60 drops) 

How to use:

  1. Use a pipette or glass dropper to transfer desired liquid into the 2 ml glass bottle.
  2. Once desired liquid is in the bottle, snap the stell ball roll-on onto the top of the bottle. The steel ball roll-on allows for smooth application of essential oils.

Helpful Hints: Using a pipette or glass dropper makes essential oil transfer much easier. Check out our selection of plastic pipettes and droppers in all different sizes to fit the bottle you are using.

description:
The amber glass of these bottles makes them not only ideal for use with essential oils, but also a powerful protection against damaging UV rays. Use them to hold any all-natural sprays, mists, or spritzes, and enjoy the convenience of being able to spray your favorite products wherever you go, whenever you need them.

What’s Included: This item is sold in a pack of six. When you order, you get six 2-ounce bottles with included pump sprayers and caps.

Size: Bottles are 4 inches tall and 1 ½ inches in diameter and hold 2 ounces of liquid.

How to Use:

  1. For best results, wipe down the threads of the sprayer and the bottle first to remove any dust or buildup.

  2. If necessary, cut the tube on the sprayer to approximately ⅛” above the bottom of the bottle.

  3. Fill the bottle with your preferred liquid.

  4. Screw the spray top on and spritz away!

Helpful Hints: If you are using the amber glass bottles to create an essential oil spray, you will have best results if you use a carrier oil (like our Coconut Oil or V-6 Vegetable Oil) or water along with some Epsom salts. Just sprinkle the Epsom salts on the bottom of the bottle, add several drops of essential oil, and allow the salts to soak up the essential oils for a few moments. Then fill the rest of the bottle with carrier oil or water, and enjoy an easy-to-apply essential oil creation.

All 1 ml bottles come with steel ball roll-ons and a cap to make essential oil use as simple and clean as possible.  

What’s Included: When you order this product, you get a pack of 12 amber 1 ml glass bottles, complete with steel ball roll-ons and black caps.

Size:  Bottles are ½" in width by 1 ½" in height and hold 1 ml of oil (between 25 and 40 drops).

How to Use:

  1. Use a pipette or glass dropper to transfer desired liquid into the 1 ml glass bottle.
  2. Once desired liquid is in the bottle, snap the stell ball roll-on onto the top of the bottle. The steel ball roll-on allows for smooth application of essential oils. 
  3. Screw the cap on to the top of the bottle, and share your essential oil magic with the world.

Helpful Hints: Using a pipette or glass dropper makes essential oil transfer much easier. Check out our selection of plastic pipettes and droppers in all different sizes to fit the bottle you are using.

It also includes the following: Expanded information about Dr. Young's worldwide travels with many never-before-seen photographs from his personal collection, a detailed application chapter that provides very detailed instructions for the amount of oil and frequency of use, integrated into 18 different application methods, definitive instructions on Dr. Young's amazing Raindrop Technique, thirteen appendixes, including a glossary of medical actions, alphabetical listing for both common and botanical names, biochemical charts and distillation charts. description:
Author Hudson Leick invites you to explore your emotions with the use of essential oils, to take a step toward health, healing, and wellbeing.

We all have our own unique ways of coping with the stresses and challenges we face in our daily lives. What we may not know is how those came to be for us personally. More importantly, we may not know how to change our way of processing emotions so that we can experience them in a more authentic—and therefore positive—way.

Rather than struggling against your human emotions, Hudson Leick shows you ways you can allow and embrace your feelings as they come up. You may not be able to eliminate difficult emotions from your life, but you can change how they manifest in your behavior.

As she so keenly puts it, you can "experience a natural unfolding, rather than a heated reaction born out of habit and fear." She wants you to know that "you are worth healing, and you really are the only one that can do it; however, this does not mean that you have to do it alone." She invites you to have courage and patience with yourself to gently explore the origins of your emotions as you strive to heal yourself whole.

These nasal inhalers have a variety of uses in both your doctor mom kit and your aromatherapy tool set. If you’re sick, use an inhaler with a decongestant essential oil on the wick to help you breathe more easily. If you want a convenient way to take your favorite oil scents with you on the go, add your preferred oils to the wick and inhale deeply throughout the day whenever you need a boost. If you want an easy way to share essential oil samples with others, just add popular oils to the wicks, screw on the caps, and pass inhalers out as samples at your next event. Because of their small size, it’s easy to slip an inhaler into your purse, pocket, briefcase, or backpack and take it with you wherever you go.  

What’s Included: The Nasal Inhaler Variety Pack includes 8 nasal inhalers with caps and 8 essential oil wicks.

Size: Inhalers are approximately 2 ½” long and ¾” in diameter.

How to Use:

  1. Add a few drops of desired essential oil to one of the included wicks.

  2. Place wick inside inhaler tube.

  3. Firmly snap inhaler tube base onto the bottom of the inhaler tube to keep the wick inside.

  4. Screw the inhaler cap over the inhaler until you are ready to use inhaler.

  5. Whenever you need a breath of purifying, healing essential oils, remove the cap of the inhaler, place inhaler under your nose, and breathe deeply.

description:
Aromatherapy, the fastest growing alternative healing method in the United States, is an effective and enjoyable way to find and maintain well-being. While its concepts are intuitive, few people realize that scientific proof exists for many of the uses of aromatherapy. In his book “Advanced Aromatherapy” author Kurt Schnaubelt, a chemist and pioneer of the science of aromatherapy, provides a scientific basis for the efficacy of essential oils, explained clearly and logically. “Advanced Aromatherapy” draws on broad-based research to demonstrate how Essential Oils interact with different systems of the body and how they affect emotional states as well as physical ones. It explains how to treat symptoms ranging from hay fever to stress disorders with predictable results. Students of aromatherapy wishing to take their practice to the next level will find that much of the guesswork used in developing formulas is no longer necessary. Professional aromatherapists will find that “Advanced Aromatherapy” turns the art of healing with Essential Oils into good medicine for the next century.

  • Aromatherapy: A Challenge to Conventional Medicine
  • Essential Oils: Definition and Distillation
  • The Effects of Essential Oils

description:
Spread the word about Young Living essential oils by allowing others the chance to sample essential oils for themselves with these beautiful, high-quality glass containers. Simply add your favorite blends to the bottle using a pipette or glass dropper, label the bottle, and share the benefits of essential oils with your loved ones, co-workers, and potential clients. All 2 ml Dram bottles come with an orifice reducer and a cap to make essential oil use as simple and clean as possible.  

What’s Included: When you order this product, you get a pack of 12 amber 2 ml glass bottles, complete with orifice reducers and black caps.

Size:  Bottles are ½" in width by 1 ½" in height and hold 2 ml of oil (between 25 and 40 drops).

How to Use:

  1. Use a pipette or glass dropper to transfer desired liquid into the 2 ml glass bottle.

  2. Once desired liquid is in the bottle, snap the orifice reducer onto the top of the bottle. The orifice reducer allows for drop-by-drop use of essential oils, making application much smoother.

  3. Screw the cap on to the top of the bottle, and share your essential oil magic with the world.

Helpful Hints: Using a pipette or glass dropper makes essential oil transfer much easier. Check out our selection of plastic pipettes and droppers in all different sizes to fit the bottle you are using.

description:
“The Healing Intelligence of Essential Oils” explores scientific breakthroughs in understanding Essential Oils and their advantages over synthetic drugs.  Kurt Schnaubelt, Ph.D., reveals how the effectiveness of Essential Oils stems from our common biochemical and cellular heritage with plants.  Recent research in molecular, cellular and evolutionary biology shows how the multilayered activities of plant essences help maintain the integrity of our genetic code.  Schnaubelt presents simple recipes and techniques for treating and preventing common ailments such as colds, flu, herpes, candida and general pain management.  New Essential Oil treatments for hepatitis, osteoporosis, liver detoxification, prevention of UV damage and melanoma are reviewed.  Possible treatments for lessening the debilitating side effects of chemotherapy and other cancer treatments are explored. Also discussed are home uses of Essential Oils for relaxation or skin care which can be utilized to help build one’s immunity and overall well-being.  Learn about the healing powers of plant essences from around the world and utilize their powers to increase your well-being with beautifully illustrated “The Healing Intelligence of Essential Oils”.

 Overview of Topics:

  • The Science of Aromatherapy
    • The Foundations of Aromatherapy
    • The Bioactivity of Essential Oils
    • From Biology to Aromatherapy
  • Recognizing Authenticity, Safety, Diversity and Fragrance
    • Authentic Essential Oils
    • Aromatherapy Safety in the Information Age

    • Essential Oils and the Skin
    • Treating Chemotherapy-Induced Vomiting and Nausea
    • Aromatherapy and Cancer

    • Essential Oils and Hepatitis B and C

description:
You’ve created your own all natural air freshener/household cleaner/perfume. Now you need the perfect container to hold your precious creation. These durable spray bottles are made of thick glass that won’t react with essential oils, and their dark blue color keeps the sunlight from shortening the life of homemade products. Add a set of four glass spray bottles to your collection and enjoy the convenience of misting your favorite products with a smooth spray.

Size: Bottles hold 4 ounces of liquid.

What’s Included: This item is sold in a pack of four. When you order, you get four cobalt blue glass bottles with trigger sprayers.

How to Use:

  1. Add desired liquid to the glass bottle.

  2. If necessary, trim the end of the tube on the sprayer to make it the ideal length (about ⅛” above the bottom of the bottle). Sprayer will work best if the tube is cut at a 45-degree angle.  

  3. When you’re ready to add the spray top on, wipe down the thread of both the bottle and the spray cap to get rid of any dust or buildup that might be there.

  4. Screw the spray cap on to the glass bottle.

  5. Spray your favorite homemade creations wherever you need them most.
name: 4 oz Blue Glass Bottle With Trigger Sprayer (4-pack)

description:
The Essential Oil Base Stick is an effective, on-the-go, no-mess solution for carrier oil dilution. And, it’s easy to use. Simply rub the stick on the desired area where you want to apply essential oils. Then, apply your favorite essential oils over the top of the area where you applied the Essential Oil Base Stick. Finish by gently massaging oils into the skin. The Essential Oil Base Stick will provide a more even and dilute distribution of the oils. The design of the Essential Oil Base stick makes it convenient to use and is easy to carry in your purse, personal bag or essential oil carrying case. Keep product out of direct sunlight and do not expose to temperatures above 85ºF.

Specifications: 5" tall and 1.5" diameter

Volume: 2 oz.

Ingredients:  Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter, Beeswax, Sweet Almond Oil, Coconut Oil

Warning: Keep product out of direct sunlight and do not expose to temperatures above 85ºF.
name: Essential Oil Base Stick
short_description: Enjoy even your “hotter" essential oils anywhere you go with this Essential Oil Base Stick. It’s the perfect solution for pre-diluting essential oils. The 2-oz stick is portable, all natural, and convenient. Apply by dabbing or spreading the Essential Oil Base Stick across the area in a swiping motion. Add a few drops of your favorite oils and gently massage the area. Keep product in cool environment.

description:
The 4-in-1 Electric Dead Skin Remover comes with four professional pedicure attachments: two nickel discs to exfoliate and remove calluses, a grinding cone designed especially for filing and shaping toe nails, and a grinding cylinder that makes smoothing the tender areas around the toenails and between the toes much easier. With this multifunctional tool, you can get your feet in the best shape of their life and maintain that soft, smooth, cuddle-worthy state all year long.

Features:

  • Harsh nickel disc smoothes away calluses and dead skin.

  • Fine nickel disc exfoliates and smoothes the skin.

  • Carborundum grinding cone files the nails.

  • Carborundum grinding cylinder repairs the tender areas around and between the toes.

  • Multifunctional magnetic stand easily stores the main device and all the attachments and can even hang on the wall.

  • Anti-slippery design makes the tool easier to use.

  • Tool is washable and water-resistant.

  • Tool is USB rechargeable and takes only about three hours to fully recharge.

What’s Included: When you order this product, you get one 4-in-1 Electric Dead Skin Remover tool with four attachments: a harsh nickel disc, a fine nickel disc, a carborundum grinding cone, and a carborundum grinding cylinder. You also get a magnetic stand for docking the device and a USB cord for easy recharging.

How to Use:

  1. Before using the Electric Dead Skin Remover, soak the feet in water for 10-15 minutes to make skin softer and easier to work on.

  2. Attach desired attachment to the main device.

  3. Press the power button to turn device on, then apply attachment slowly to skin or nails depending on attachment being used.

  4. Enjoy the silky smoothness of your freshly-pedicured feet!
name: 4 in 1 Electric Dead Skin Remover
short_description: Pamper yourself with a home pedicure using this easy-to-operate, professional quality  4-in-1 tool. From exfoliating to toenail shaping, it’s the only tool you’ll need to get your feet looking fresh and soft for the summer.

description:
When you need to transfer essential oils, mix oils together, or fill empty pill capsules, disposable pipettes are the perfect tool. Inexpensive and easy-to-use, these 1.5-ml-size plastic pipettes are a must-have for your medicine cabinet.  

What’s Included: This item is sold in a package of six. When you order, you get six disposable pipettes, each 1.5 ml in size.

Size: Pipettes hold 1.5 ml of liquid.

How to Use: Disposable pipettes are handy and easy to use. Just follow these steps:

  1. Squeeze the bulb of the pipette.

  2. Place the tip of the pipette into desired liquid and release the bulb while tip is still submersed in liquid. This will fill the pipette up with liquid.

  3. Squeeze the bulb to release liquid from the pipette.   

Helpful Hints: If you need different size pipettes for different jobs, check out our larger pipette size, which holds 3 ml of liquid.
name: 1.5 ml Disposable Pipette (6-pack)
short_description: Make essential oil transfer mess-free, accurate, and simple with these 1.5 ml disposable pipettes.

description:
Ancient texts describe how Egyptian priests and physicians used essential oils thousands of years before the time of Christ. The Egyptians anointed their bodies with aromatic oils. They were the first to use them in the earliest cosmetics. They believed in bathing often and anointing their bodies with the aromatics to keep their skin healthy, soft, smooth and youthful. In this book, you will:

  • Discover the ancient secrets to healthy, youthful skin and aging gracefully.
  • Learn what toxic skin care chemicals do in aging you and your skin.
  • Learn wholesome, natural, organic youth-enhancing recipes - NO toxic chemicals!
  • Learn Cleopatra's treasures to beautiful skin and longevity.
  • Discover the latest trends in inner and outer beauty care.

Aromatherapy is an ancient practice of using naturally distilled roots, leaves, bark, stems and flowers of the plant for their essential oils. The Egyptians believed in perfuming their bodies with these oils to make themselves more attractive and alluring. Many of their ointments served as medicines as well due to their healing properties and now you can take advantage of this ancient and time proven wisdom.

Weight: 1.8 lbs

Page Count: 240

Dimensions: 11 x 8.5 x 1 inch

description:

Add them to your homemade beauty products and see the difference in your skin, hair, and nails. With all of their natural debris removed, these white pellets create a makeup base that is pure and easy-to-use.

  2. Once desired liquid is in the bottle, snap the reducer. The reducer allows for easy application of essential oils. 
  3. Screw the cap on to the top of the bottle, and share your essential oil magic with the world.

Helpful Hints: Using a pipette or glass dropper makes essential oil transfer much easier. Check out our selection of plastic pipettes and droppers in all different sizes to fit the bottle you are using.

description:
You’ve created your own all natural air freshener/household cleaner/perfume. Now you need the perfect container to hold your precious creation. These durable spray bottles are made of thick glass that won’t react with essential oils, and their amber color keeps the sunlight from shortening the life of homemade products. Add a set of four glass spray bottles to your collection and enjoy the convenience of misting your favorite products with a smooth spray.

Size: Bottles hold 4 ounces of liquid.

What’s Included: This item is sold in a pack of four. When you order, you get four amber glass bottles with trigger sprayers.

How to Use:

  1. Add desired liquid to the glass bottle.

  2. If necessary, trim the end of the tube on the sprayer to make it the ideal length (about ⅛” above the bottom of the bottle). Sprayer will work best if the tube is cut at a 45-degree angle.  

  3. When you’re ready to add the spray top on, wipe down the thread of both the bottle and the spray cap to get rid of any dust or buildup that might be there.

  4. Screw the spray cap on to the glass bottle.

  5. Spray your favorite homemade creations wherever you need them most.
name: 4 oz Amber Glass Bottle with Trigger Sprayer (4-pack)
short_description: Mist your homemade room sprays, household cleaners, and floral waters into the air using these eye-catching amber glass bottles with trigger sprayers. Made of durable amber glass, they are ideal for use with essential oils and will keep harmful UV rays from ruining your creations.

description:
The cobalt blue glass of these bottles makes them not only ideal for use with essential oils, but also a powerful protection against damaging UV rays. Use them to hold any all-natural sprays, mists, or spritzes, and enjoy the convenience of being able to spray your favorite products wherever you go, whenever you need them.

What’s Included: This item is sold in a pack of six. When you order, you get six cobalt blue 2-ounce bottles with included pump sprayers and caps.

Size: Bottles are 4 inches tall and 1 ½ inches in diameter and hold 2 ounces of liquid.

How to Use:

  1. For best results, wipe down the threads of the sprayer and the bottle first to remove any dust or buildup.

  2. If necessary, cut the tube on the sprayer to approximately ⅛” above the bottom of the bottle.

  3. Fill the bottle with your preferred liquid.

  4. Screw the spray top on and spritz away!

Helpful Hints: If you are using the cobalt blue glass bottles to create an essential oil spray, you will have best results if you use a carrier oil (like our Coconut Oil or V-6 Vegetable Oil) or water along with some Epsom salts. Just sprinkle the Epsom salts on the bottom of the bottle, add several drops of essential oil, and allow the salts to soak up the essential oils for a few moments. Then fill the rest of the bottle with carrier oil or water, and enjoy an easy-to-apply essential oil creation.

description:
When it comes to essential oils, it seems that everything is always one-sided, usually with a major slant toward one specific brand. There is a lot of misinformation, speculation, and assumption going around, as well as a lot of bad advice given by people who never did their research. This book comes at it from a neutral perspective, without all the hype, in hopes to dispel some of the myths and rumors about essential oils. The Essential Oil Truth will help you gain a greater understanding of the true nature and beauty of essential oils and their proper use for your everyday life. This second edition of The Essential Oil Truth gives you more clarity and extended content with beautiful black and white imagery and an updated cover.

description:
Use this set of colorful 1/2 oz amber glass bottles to store your favorite homemade beauty and health products. With six bottles in a pack, these bottles are the perfect size to share your homemade creations with family, friends, and clients. The amber glass keeps out harmful UV rays, keeping your creations fresh longer.

What’s Included: When you order this product, you get 6 amber 1/2 oz glass bottles. You also get pump sprayers and caps to fit the bottles.

Size: Bottles hold approximately ½ ounce of liquid.  

How to Use:

  1. To fill amber pump bottles with your desired liquid, first remove the cap by unscrewing it.  

  2. Add oils, water, perfumes, hand sanitizing sprays, or floral spritzes to the bottle. If you are using essential oils in your concoction, check out our selection of droppers and pipettes to make transfer easier.

  3. Screw the pump spray cap onto the bottle and enjoy the ease and convenience of being able to spray your favorite creations whenever you need them.

Helpful Hints: If you are using these bottles to share your homemade natural products with others, be sure to include a label so that others know what they are getting. Even if you are using them to store your own products, labeling them will ensure you don’t forget the contents of your bottles.
name: 1/2 oz Amber Glass Bottles with Pump Sprayers (6-pack) - Young Living
short_description: Use these tiny ½ ounce pump sprayer bottles to store essential oil blends, perfumes, floral waters, and other homemade creations. They’re the perfect size for sharing with others or carrying your favorite creations around with you.

description:
Use these multi-colored glass roll-on bottles to make the application of your favorite essential oil blends more effective. Whether you use a single oil, an oil blend, or your favorite massage oil, the roll-on tops allow you to apply the oil directly where you want it and do so evenly and smoothly. Best of all, these roll-on bottles are easy to use: Simply add oil blends to the bottle using a glass dropper or pipette, snap the roll-on ball to the top, and roll away your aches, worries, and stresses.  

What’s Included: Three 10 ML glass roll-on bottles with steel balls. Bottles come in green, pink, and clear. Silver caps are included.

Size: Bottles are 3 ¼” high and ¾” in diameter. Bottles hold 10 ML, or about ⅓ ounce, of liquid.  

How to Use:

  1. Add desired liquid to the roll-on glass bottles. If you are using essential oils, you will likely have best results if you also use a carrier oil to make the roll-on bottle roll more evenly. (Try using our glass droppers or pipettes for the easiest transfer of oils.)
  2. While holding the bottle upright, carefully and firmly push the roller top onto the mouth of the bottle until it clicks into place.
  3. Label your bottle so you don’t forget what’s inside.
  4. Store bottles upright to prevent spills.

Helpful Hints: If you misplace or wear out any of the steel balls in these roll-on bottles, it’s easy to replace them. Just order a six-pack of our Steel Roll-on Ball Replacements and pop a new steel ball into your glass bottle top.
name: 10 ML Multi-Colored Steel Ball Roll-on Bottles (3-pack)
short_description: Roll-on glass bottles are an easy and mess-free way to apply your favorite essential oils and blends to your skin. This multi-colored three-pack allows you to color code your creations for easy organization.

description:
It’s becoming more and more popular to use essential oils to make essential oil blends and homemade cosmetics, creams, and sprays. When you do this kind of custom creating, it’s important to use glass bottles, not plastic, so that the chemicals in plastic don’t get into the oil mixture. These cobalt blue glass bottles are ideal for all of your oil-mixing and cosmetic-creating needs. Made of cobalt blue colored glass, they allow less light in than clear glass, allowing the contents of the bottles to stay pure for a longer period of time.

The 1 oz. size is the perfect size to fit in your purse, backpack, or briefcase for more convenient travel. At less than a dollar apiece, these cobalt blue glass bottles are a must-have for your essential oil toolset.  

What’s Included: Six 1 oz. cobalt blue glass bottles with pump sprayers and plastic caps.

Size: Bottles hold 1 oz. of liquid.

How to Use:

  1. Transfer essential oils or other materials into the glass bottles using a glass dropper or pipette.

  2. Cut the sprayer top’s tube to the appropriate length if necessary. For best results, cut it at a 45-degree angle.

  3. Screw the pump sprayer lid on tightly.

  4. Replace the plastic cap.

  5. Carry your favorite creations with you wherever you go and easily share them with family and friends.

Helpful Hints:

  1. Check out our selection of glass droppers to make your essential oil mixing much easier and mess-free!

  2. If you are using the glass bottles to make a liquid spray with your favorite essential oils, try using epsom salts to keep the oil and water from separating. Just sprinkle epsom salts on the bottom of the bottle, add your essential oils, then fill the remainder of the bottle with water.
name: 1 oz Cobalt Blue Glass Bottles with Pump Sprayer (6-pack) - Young Living
short_description: With a six-pack of 1 oz. glass spray bottles, the possibilities for your essential oil mixing are endless. Mix up your favorite essential oil blends, carry them with you wherever you go, share them with friends, and find that your essential oil use has just become ultra portable.

description:
Spread the word about Young Living essential oils by allowing others the chance to sample essential oils for themselves with these beautiful, high-quality glass containers. Simply add your favorite blends to the bottle using a pipette or glass dropper, label the bottle, and share the benefits of essential oils with your loved ones, co-workers, and potential clients. All 2 ml cobalt bottles come with an orifice reducer and a cap to make essential oil use as simple and clean as possible.  

What’s Included: When you order this product, you get a pack of 12 cobalt blue 2 ml glass bottles, complete with orifice reducers and black caps.

Size:  Bottles are ½" in width by 1 ½" in height and holds 2 ml of oil (between 25 and 40 drops).

How to Use:

  1. Use a pipette or glass dropper to transfer desired liquid into the 2 ml glass bottle.

  2. Once desired liquid is in the bottle, snap the orifice reducer onto the top of the bottle. The orifice reducer allows for drop-by-drop use of essential oils, making application much smoother.

  3. Screw the cap on to the top of the bottle, and share your essential oil magic with the world.

Helpful Hints: Using a pipette or glass dropper makes essential oil transfer much easier. Check out our selection of plastic pipettes and droppers in all different sizes to fit the bottle you are using.
name: 2 ml Cobalt Blue Bottle with Reducer (12-pack) Unbranded
