description:
Give yourself an instant and flawless manicure with these user-friendly nail polish strips. Just stick them onto your clean and buffed nails, file away the extra, and enjoy a beautiful, long-lasting manicure. These nail polish strips are made of real nail polish, but through ingenious design, they are temporarily stretchable so that you can smooth them out across your nail to achieve the perfect finish. Once they are smoothed onto your nail, they stay put and look and act just like professional nail polish. Choose from five stylish designs and colors to match all of your favorite outfits.  

What’s Included: When you order this item, you get 20 nail strips and an included nail buffer.

Size: Stickers to fit all sizes.

How to Use:

  1. For best results with your nail polish strips, first clean and buff nails and push back nail cuticles.

  2. When nails are clean, select the right size nail sticker to fit each of your nails.

  3. Pull the clear film gently off the top of the nail sticker, then gently off the bottom of the nail sticker. Hold onto the silver strip of the sticker.

  4. Holding the silver strip, match the rounded part of the sticker sticky-side-down to the rounded base of your nail.

  5. Press the rest of the sticker across the surface of your nail until you have a smooth, even-looking finish.

  6. Fold excess of strip under your nail and file it away with a nail file.

  7. To remove, simply use nail polish remover as you would with regular nail polish.
name: Nail Polish Strips - White
short_description: Eliminate the hassle of painted nails with these perfect-every-time nail polish strips. Easy to use and with a shiny, professional finish, these nail polish strips will end your days of smudges and chipping all while advertising your affiliation with Young Living.

description:
Essential oils can be as helpful to cats as they are to humans. With a few guidelines and tips, you can share the gift of essential oils with your cats, helping to make their lives healthier and toxin-free. This mini booklet gives you a quick overview of which oils can be helpful and helps you assemble a specialized “care kit” for your furry feline friends. It makes the perfect share tool for other cat lovers, and comes in a great price point.

What's included: Mini Booklets sold individually

Page Count: 32

Year Published: 2018
name: Cats 101 Mini Booklet 1st Edition (10 Pack)
short_description:
This item is the 1st Edition. You will receive a pack of 10.

Cats do as they please, and they certainly have their hang-ups. But using essential oils doesn’t have to be one of them. Yes, you can use essential oils with cats. You just have to use the right oils and be careful of how much you use. Essential oils provide a natural option as you care for your canine friends. This 32-page mini booklet gives you the perfect overview for easy-to-use oils you may already have in your home. Use it to introduce new people to oils and share in the joy of healthier, happier, more stress-free living!

description:
The ancient art of using essential oils and the sacred movement of yoga are combined to heighten your practice and to bring forth more peace, health, and joy to your life.

This DVD is made for beginners in mind, with two classes, morning and evening. First, an invigorating morning practice to wake up, refresh yourself, and start your day right: and second, a shorter evening session, made to unwind the stresses of the day to support inner peace and to set you up for better sleep. 

Most importantly, commit to doing your yoga practice and using the oils with the intent to love and accept yourself as you are, right here, right now. Everything blooms in the presence of love, and everything heals in that same presence. 

Learning to fully and completely love and accept yourself may be the most important work you ever do in this lifetime. This DVD was made to support you in your efforts towards that goal. 

Hudson Leick has been teaching yoga for over twenty years. She teaches many modalities of yoga and offers her subtle blend on this DVD.
name: Essential Oil-Infused Yoga by Hudson Leick - DVD
short_description:
This DVD is made for beginners in mind, with two classes, morning and evening. Integrating Young Living Essential Oils into yoga, Hudson Leick guides the user through various poses to relax, invigorate, and calm. First, an invigorating morning practice to wake up, refresh yourself, and start your day right. And second, a shorter evening session made to unwind the stresses of the day to support inner peace and to set you up for better sleep.

Hudson Leick has been teaching yoga for over twenty years. She teaches many modalities of yoga and offers her subtle blend on this DVD. 

Approximate run time: 71 minutes.

description:
Men are, by and large, less likely to take control of their own health than women. Perhaps it’s a macho thing, but it’s true—especially where essential oils are concerned. While women increasingly enjoy the health benefits of essential oils, the men in their lives remain stubbornly skeptical. If you’re a woman who uses oils for your health, you know all the excuses men have to avoid using oils—excuses that range from unreasonable doubts to outright refusals to even consider the possibility.

For many women, watching the men in their lives dismiss the proven health benefits of essential oils is painful. You want the best for your husband, son, friends, and family, but you can’t convince them of how well essential oils work.

You Can Lead a Man to Oils… is a lighthearted but convincing book targeting male resistance to essential oil use written by a reformed oil skeptic. Author Ron Corica reveals how to introduce essential oils to men and how to address misinformed opinions. Corica offers his own story, personal testimonials, and practical tips to both men and women to help them move into a new state of wellness.

Page Count: 161

description:
Intermittent fasting is very popular right now. However, if you think you can eat toxic food five days a week and fast for two, and not face negative body reactions, think again.

PURE 5:2 takes you to the root of healthy eating with intermittent fasting, intuitive fasting, intuitive eating and raw food cuisine. Whether you are a Paleo, raw foodist, gluten or dairy free, vegan, low-carb or vegetarian, the information, recipes, and the intuitive eating tools and techniques in this book will take you to a wholesome new level.

Using wisdom gained from 18 years of teaching raw food workshops, working with a wide range of people with dietary and weight-loss issues, Robyn and Geoff Randolf have merged intermittent fasting and intuitive eating. In 21 days you can:

description:
In this 54 page book, author Matthew Tart, (Master of Arts in Theological Studies, Bethel Seminary) will take you on an oily journey to the cross. This contemplative, full-color book lays a simple foundation of essential oils in the Bible, and then builds a powerful theological perspective, illuminating truths in the events leading up to the crucifixion of Jesus. You will find the images and text beautiful and moving, as you pause to reflect with each page. It is thought provoking, worshipful, and inspirational, and perfect for personal enrichment, Bible studies, gifts, and as a Christian-based introduction to essential oils.

What People are saying:

“As a Christian, I had yet to find a clear and Biblically based understanding of essential oils and Scripture. Your book was the missing link for me and I am sure for many! Thank you!” – Renee

“Your book has changed my picture of what happened in a few of the biblical stories. The thought that I can smell what my savior was anointed with is amazing to me. Now, I truly see how God didn't mess this up. The symbolism is unreal. Thank you for sharing.” - Ivy

“Have this book and it is awesome!” – Deborah

“Read this book 3 times!!!!! In a week!” – Felicia

description:
Within the information on this USB, you will find the information you need to change your life so you can change the lives of others around you.

 You will find:

 3 Very in depth classes

About 1 hour and 15 minutes long

You will be able to teach classes and look professional

Included homework assignments

PDF Slides of every class

AND a bonus audio

 

Gain the knowledge of Teri Secrets’ 35 years of experience in business!

 

Igniting the Entrepreneur In You

Get ready to learn the 3 most important skills to maximize success in any business and take that business to the top! Teri Secrest takes you through this exciting journey of going from Employer to entrepreneur with grace and ease! Included in this course: transforming your mindset, changing downhill habits into uphill habits, discovering your true passion, how to discover and develop your business strategy, how to manage your time well, finding your mentors, becoming a mentor, developing the 5 vital qualities of a leader.

 PLUS: The PDF of the slides!

 

Become a Leader of Influence

Do you know you are born to be a person of influence? You are created to be a world changer! In this online course, Teri Secrest walks you through strategies for developing core confidence, understanding that you are truly marked for success and she gives you a path for expanding both. Looking at wisdom from the past, you will learn how to structure your business and avoid swimming upstream! You will learn the importance of asking good questions and the art of listening. Teri shares 5 ways to develop insight in your business and how to become the trend! Discover the power of your inner circle and how to choose someone for your circle. This teaching concludes with how to develop your own personal style in business!

 PLUS: The PDF of the slides!

 

A Biblical Perspective on Essential Oils Digital Course:

Join Teri Secrest for a fascinating journey back in time to learn about the Biblical history of essential oils. Discover the secret to Esther’s irresistible beauty. Find out why Moses made the Holy Anointing Oil unto the Lord. Learn the customs of anointing Kings and sanctifying the temple to keep it pure. Imagine having access today, to the same oils used over 2000 years ago for maintaining wellbeing and vitality.

 PLUS: The PDF of the slides!

 

BONUS: Anchoring Your Life in Joy ~ Audio

Are you desiring a flood of joy to enter into your life? What if by adding a few simple tools your tool chest you could live the words Jesus repeatedly spoke, “Be of good cheer”!

I want to hand you 3 keys to intentionally creating a joyful life and 5 action steps to get you there!

 

To book Teri as a keynote conference or ministry event speaker, go to www.terisecrest.com

description:
Jojoba oil is technically not really an oil at all. It’s a liquefied form of vegetable wax that comes from the nuts and seeds of the jojoba plant, an evergreen shrub that grows in hot desert areas. Because it’s colorless, odorless, and has a smooth viscosity, it is perfect for use as a carrier. Due to the natural vitamins and minerals present, it stays fresh much longer than other oils without going rancid. It’s mild nature also makes it nearly hypoallergenic so it’s suitable for even the most sensitive skin.

 What’s Included: 1 6-ounce bottle of 100% pure, cold expeller-pressed jojoba oil

 

 Size: 1.75” Diameter x 6.25” Height

 How to Use:

 Dispense directly from the bottle, or use our apothecary-style droppers to measure exact amounts into the glassware of your choosing. Combine with up to 1:1 with your favorite essential oils.

 

 Helpful Hints: Jojoba is the perfect carrier for all parts of the body. It’s great for hair, particularly smoothing the ends, and makes an excellent moisturizer or massage oil. Use it in conjunction with Raindrop Technique®, particularly if the recipient is ultra-sensitive and requires dilution from “hot” oils.
name: Jojoba Oil 6 oz.
short_description: Jojoba oil, technically a wax, is the one emollient in nature that is most bio-identical to sebum, the natural human skin oil produced by glands below the surface. It naturally conditions skin to stay supple, soft, elastic, and dewy. It’s also lighter weight than other deep conditioning oils so it’s perfect for a variety of applications. Jojoba makes the perfect carrier for any essential oil.

description:
Due to a grandfather clause in the Toxic Substance Control Act (TSCA), it is estimated that 65,000-100,000 chemicals are in our market today that have not been thoroughly tested! Labels on other products imply they are safe when in reality their ingredients can be dangerous!  In the “Chemical Free Home” author Melissa Poepping identifies some of the common toxins people are exposed to daily in everyday household items.  Using Essential Oils as a key ingredient learn how to create safe substitutions. Recipes for deodorant, furnish polish and laundry detergent are just some of the many examples that can be safely reproduced using this booklet as a guide.  Enjoy a greater peace of mind, create a cleaner, purer home environment and expect better health by following the recipes and guidelines found within “The Chemical Free Home”.

description:
The Simplified Chinese translation of the 6th edition of the Essential Oils Desk Reference is your comprehensive guide to the vast properties and capabilities of pure essential oils. Its compilation is based upon the factual findings of scientific research and provides a clear, comprehensive guide to using essential oils. Spiral binding allows pages to open completely and lie flat, facilitating transition from reading to oil application. Color-coding of six main sections makes the Essential Oils Desk Reference easy to use.

A brief overview of each section is as follows:

Section 1: Introduction

  • A Brief History of Essential OIls and Their Place in Modern Medicine

  • A Breakdown of the chemistry of Essential Oils and Effects

  • How to Safely Use Essential Oils

Section 2: Products

  • Single Essential Oils and Their Application Codes

  • Essential Oil Blends and Their Application Codes

  • Nutritional References and Supplements

  • Ningxia

  • Hormones and Personal Body Care

  • Essential Oils and Nutrition for Children

  • Essential Oils Use in the Home

  • Animal Care with Essential Oils

Section 3: Application

  • Neuro Auricular Technique

  • Lymphatic Pump

  • Vita Flex Technique

  • Raindrop Technique

Section 4: Special Issues

  • Mental and Emotional Rejuvenation and Support

  • Aging

  • Cleansing and Diet

  • Enzymes, Minerals, and Water

  • Antioxidants

  • Microbes

Section 5: Personal Usage

  • Getting Started with Essential Oils

  • Quick Usage Guide

  • Taking Charge of Your Health

Section 6: Appendix

description:
The Black & Gold Twist Atomizer is the perfect addition to any handbag or cosmetic case. Its convenient size and shape allow you to take your favorite essential oil mist wherever you go. Filling it is easy, and the elegant gold detailing on the sprayer and button elevates this functional accessory’s classic styling.

 What’s Included: 1 8ml Black & Gold Twist Atomizer

 Size: 1” Diameter x 3.25” Length

 How to Use:

 1. Gently pull the empty atomizer apart at the middle.

2. Carefully lift the gold-buttoned top from the casing.

3. Twist the top off of the glass reservoir.

4. Add distilled water to within ¼ inch of the top.

5. Add your favorite essential oils.

6. Replace the top.

7. Tuck the glass reservoir back into the casing.

8. Re-assemble the two parts of the casing.

9. Shake well.

10. Twist at the center of the casing to push up the gold button

11. Spray at your leisure.

12. Twist to tuck the gold button within the casing and prevent spills.

 Helpful Hints: Clean the reservoir after using up each batch. Do not use pure oil in this atomizer, cut with distilled water.
name: 8 ml Black Atomizer with Gold Twist
short_description: This elegant twist-up refillable personal atomizer allows you to take your favorite aromatic mist anywhere. The twist up lid allows you tuck it away and prevents accidental leaks. With the convenient size and shape of an oversized lipstick, it’s the perfect portable travel accessory.

description:
This is the must-have immune support how-to guide for every Young Living member.  Are you and your members ready to learn about the MAGIC of THIEVES?  Instantly convert reluctant oilers into valued customers by showing them how to experience Young Livings highly effective immune support products for staying healthy all year long.  
 
Winter Wellness showcases Thieves, plus Young Livings most popular winter wellness products.  Includes sections on:
  • Whole Body Immune Support
  • Throat Support
  • Respiratory Support
  • Healthy Ear Support
  • Soothing Stomach Support
  • Post-exertion (think snow shoveling) Muscle & Joint Support

  • Essential Rewards
  • Young Livings top Wellness Products
Leaders combine this with 3 short instructional videos to help their members experience the magic that happens when they know exactly when and how to use Young Livings great products.  
 
Don't delay.  Immune support is one of the very top benefits of essential oils that everyone needs to know about. 
 
Marie Ruggles, MS, RD, CN, CDE has a master's degree in Nutrition & Public Health from Columbia University, and a certificate in essential oil safety from the Tisserand Institute. Type her name into the search bar to see her other publications that make it so easy to learn about the best uses of essential oils and oil-infused products.

description:
Our pets are part of the family. That's why we want the best for them. We want them to live long, happy lives. But so many products in our homes can threaten the wellness and well-being of our furry friends.

If you're an oil-using family, it's only natural to want to use oils to help your pets stay healthy, balanced, and more comfortable. In the same way that Young Living products transform human lives, they can be life-changing for household pets. Author Katherine Fuller wants you to know all about the pitfalls of toxins, limiting your pets' exposure, and using products that offer a better way.

description:
This book is loaded with tools and strategies you can use to kick anxiety in its ass. Anxiety is not just about one thing. It's about a lot of little things. You'll find yourself referring to the quick reference gude again and again. 

From the Author: I was a stressed out working mom with kids and didn't know how to support my daughter with her Anxiety and Depression. We were at rock bottom and thought we had tried everything. I was extremely skeptical about trying new things until someone showed me a different way. This book will help you see that Anxiety is not just one thing but could be a combination of a lot of little things. From food, supplements to other therapies that are very effective.

About the Author: Stacy Tiegs has been a small business owner & entrepreneur for over 15 years. She has passionately been helping people get to the root cause of thier problems. She is a seeker of adventure and fun in everything she does. She's all about the little things and reading and studying natural health that has made her a pillar in the health industry. She is also certified in mental strength coaching and a professional from the old school of hard knoxs.

description:
Many people think that it’s normal to come down with an illness each year and, for some, two or three times a year. Yet researchers have proven that nutrition and lifestyle factors can boost your immune system.

Learn how to build a kitchen pharmacy of whole foods, superfoods and nutrients to provide a stable foundation for your health. And when you’re at an increased risk of infection, know what to do to derail a virus before it takes hold.

Follow this immune-boosting roadmap to a healthier diet, making you less prone to viral infections and more resilient after an illness.

In Optimize Your Immune System, you’ll read about the three phases of immune support.

  • Phase I: Everyday immune strengthening and care
  • Phase II: After exposure to an unhealthy person or environment
  • Phase III: Immune-boosting support to prevent an illness when you feel like you're coming down with something

For each of these phases, Marie Ruggles, M.S., R.D., C.N., C.D.E., draws upon over forty years of experience within the wellness arena.

The book begins with her explaining how the immune system works and what it does. From there, she discusses the foods that help and hinder our immunity. She even gives a whole foods quick start guide for those who aren’t too certain where to start.

She also shares the concept of juice bathing, and how to use that to minimize the fuss and mess of juicing while maximizing its benefit.

Optimize Your Immune System makes specific recommendations for how to fortify and stimulate your body’s natural defenses using a simple kitchen pharmacy, no matter which phase of immune support you are facing.

Diving deep, the book looks closely at whole foods, superfoods, nutrients and supplements, even giving specific product recommendations for those brands and products the author personally loves most.

The final chapter of the book pulls everything together in an easy-to-reference format sharing phase-specific recommendations, as well as how to eat more nutritious foods even if you’re on a limited budget.

For those who are new to the subject of natural wellness, the book is easy-to-read and written in a friendly manner. Yet, for those who are already familiar with the topic, it proves to be a valuable reference guide as well.

 

Page Count: 134
name: Optimize Your Immune System: Create Health and Resilience with a Kitchen Pharmacy

description:
The Essential Oils Pocket On The Go App

This Pocket On The Go App is now available for all of our customers to purchase for themselves or for their team members and friends.

  • Mobile, comprehensive Pocket Reference information
  • Unlimited personal use
  • Accessible anytime, anywhere
  • One user per App

Special Note: This Pocket On the Go App requires an activation login and password. When you purchase this App, you will be asked to provide the email for the person you are gifting the App. Please make sure you have the recipient's correct email. Once the App is purchased/gifted, the recipient will receive an email with instructions on how to activate the App. Their login is the email address you provided during the purchase of the App on www.discoverlsp.com.

Once the recipient receives notification of the gifted App, they will be instructed to go to www.discoverlsp.com to create an account with the email you used. Their password will be created during that process. It will be important for the recipient to write down or make a note of their email and password during the login and account creation process. Once that process is complete, the recipient must download the Pocket On The Go App from on App store. The App is available on Android and iTunes. The first time they login to use the App, it will prompt them to enter their login email and password.

Thank you for your support of Life Science Publishing Education.
